text: Ahmed Ben Salah () (13 January 1926 – 16 September 2020) was a Tunisian politician and trades union leader. His ideas for a planned economy were important for Tunisia's economic development between 1957 to 1969.Noura Borsali, Livre d'entretiens avec Ahmed Ben Salah, Tunis, 2008 () He was born in Moknine, Tunisia. Ben Salah was the Minister of Finance between 1961 to 1969. Ben Salah died on 16 September 2020 in Tunis at the age of 94.Décès d'Ahmed Ben Salah ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Tunisian politicians Category:Trade unionists
title: Ahmed Ben Salah
